languages.text: На кожаных обложках нанесены имена авторов — в основном философов и теологов с Даргонуса. Корешки книг отделаны золотом.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Все книги как на подбор дорогие и богатые, кричащие о статусе владельца

languages.text: The leather covers bear the names of the authors, mostly philosophers and theologians from Dargonus. The spines of the books are trimmed with gold.
languages.original_text: На кожаных обложках нанесены имена авторов — в основном философов и теологов с Даргонуса. Корешки книг отделаны золотом.

traits.locale_text: The leather covers bear the names of the authors, mostly philosophers and theologians from Dargonus. The spines of the books are trimmed with gold.
The leather covers bear the names of the authors, mostly philosophers and theologians from Dargonus. The spines of the books are trimmed with gold.
The leather covers bear the names of the authors, mostly philosophers and theologians from Dargonus. The spines of the books are trimmed with gold.

languages.text: 皮革封面上写着作者的名字，这些作者大部分都是来自达戈努斯的哲学家与神学家。书脊上镶着金边。
languages.original_text: The leather covers bear the names of the authors, mostly philosophers and theologians from Dargonus. The spines of the books are trimmed with gold.

traits.locale_text: 皮革封面上写着作者的名字，这些作者大部分都是来自达戈努斯的哲学家与神学家。书脊上镶着金边。

languages.text: Las tapas de cuero llevan los nombres de los autores, por lo general filósofos y teólogos de Dargonus. Los lomos de los libros están decorados con oro.
languages.original_text: The leather covers bear the names of the authors, mostly philosophers and theologians from Dargonus. The spines of the books are trimmed with gold.

traits.locale_text: Las tapas de cuero llevan los nombres de los autores, por lo general filósofos y teólogos de Dargonus. Los lomos de los libros están decorados con oro.

languages.text: 革の表紙には主にダルゴナスの哲学者や神学者などの作者の名前が書かれている。背表紙は金で縁どられている。
languages.original_text: The leather covers bear the names of the authors, mostly philosophers and theologians from Dargonus. The spines of the books are trimmed with gold.

traits.locale_text: 革の表紙には主にダルゴナスの哲学者や神学者などの作者の名前が書かれている。背表紙は金で縁どられている。

languages.text: Der Lederumschlag trägt die Namen der Autoren, hauptsächlich Philosophen und Theologen von Dargonus. Die Rücken der Bücher sind mit Gold verziert.
languages.original_text: The leather covers bear the names of the authors, mostly philosophers and theologians from Dargonus. The spines of the books are trimmed with gold.

traits.locale_text: Der Lederumschlag trägt die Namen der Autoren, hauptsächlich Philosophen und Theologen von Dargonus. Die Rücken der Bücher sind mit Gold verziert.

languages.text: Les couvertures de cuir de ces livres aux finitions dorées sont dotées des noms des auteurs, principalement des philosophes et des théologiens de Dargonus.
languages.original_text: The leather covers bear the names of the authors, mostly philosophers and theologians from Dargonus. The spines of the books are trimmed with gold.

traits.locale_text: Les couvertures de cuir de ces livres aux finitions dorées sont dotées des noms des auteurs, principalement des philosophes et des théologiens de Dargonus.

languages.text: Deri kapaklarda yazarların isimleri yazıyor. Çoğu, Dargonus filozofu ve ilahiyatçısı. Kitapların sırtları altın kaplama.
languages.original_text: The leather covers bear the names of the authors, mostly philosophers and theologians from Dargonus. The spines of the books are trimmed with gold.

traits.locale_text: Deri kapaklarda yazarların isimleri yazıyor. Çoğu Dargonus filozofu ve ilahiyatçısı. Kitapların sırtları altın kaplama.
